00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # Receive controlPWM data as a UDP stream, packed as an FG_FDM object
00003 # Based on runsim.py by Ardupilot Tools git
00004 
00005 import roslib
00006 import sys
00007 import rospy
00008 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3, Vector3Stamped
00009 import numpy as np
00010 import tf.transformations
00011 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb, Vector2Array
00012 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimPWM, Environment
00013 
00014 from pymavlink import fgFDM
00015 import socket, struct, errno
00016 
00017 def interpret_address(addrstr):
00018     '''interpret a IP:port string'''
00019     a = addrstr.split(':')
00020     a[1] = int(a[1])
00021     return tuple(a)
00022 
00023 def process_ctrl_input(buf):
00024         global fdm_ctrls
00025 
00026         fdm_ctrls.parse(buf)
00027         ctrls = SimPWM()
00028         ctrls.value[0] = fdm_ctrls.get('left_aileron')
00029         ctrls.value[1] = fdm_ctrls.get('elevator')
00030         ctrls.value[2] = fdm_ctrls.get('rpm')
00031         ctrls.value[3] = fdm_ctrls.get('rudder')
00032         # ctrls.value[5] = fdm_ctrls.get('speedbrake')
00033         ctrls.value[5] = 1000
00034         # print ctrls
00035         pub.publish(ctrls)
00036 
00037 
00038 jsb_out_address = "127.0.0.1:5505" # FDM control data coming into the ROS Simulator from Ardupilot
00039 jsb_out = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
00040 jsb_out.bind(interpret_address(jsb_out_address))
00041 # jsb_out.setblocking(0)
00042 
00043 fdm_ctrls = fgFDM.fgFDM()
00044 
00045 ###############
00046 ## Main Program
00047 ###############
00048 
00049 if __name__ == '__main__':
00050         try:
00051                 rospy.init_node('fdmUDPReceive')
00052                 # pub = rospy.Publisher('/fw1/ctrlPWM',SimPWM)
00053                 pub = rospy.Publisher('ctrlPWM',SimPWM)
00054 
00055                 timer = rospy.Rate(1000)
00056 
00057                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00058 
00059                         buf = jsb_out.recv(fdm_ctrls.packet_size())
00060                         if buf:
00061                                 process_ctrl_input(buf)
00062 
00063                         timer.sleep()
00064 
00065                 print "this node is pretty much dead"
00066 
00067         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00068                 print "something bad happened"
00069                 pass
